name: AngularJS-Spring
tagline: Web application that uses AngularJS 1.4, Bootstrap CSS, Spring Rest, Hibernate, and Spring Bootstrap.
body:
This website is implemented using the following:

##Client Side:
		AngularJS 1.4
		Bootstrap CSS
		Font Awesome
		Google Code Prettify

##Server Side:
		Spring Bootstrap
		Spring Rest
		Spring Security
		Hibernate
		MYSQL

##Features:
		Login/Logout
		Add Author by Admin
		Add/Edit Articles by Author
		Publish Articles
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
